# isDash

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the scalar is a punctuation symbol explicitly called out as a dash in the Unicode Standard or a compatibility equivalent.

## Declaration

```swift
var isDash: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property corresponds to the “Dash” property in the [http://www.unicode.org/versions/latest/].
title: isDash
